text: "Heya hun, I decided to stop by and fill you in on some things. How have you been?"
"Oh right...you're one of our quiet agents. Good at obeying orders, not so good a talking."

"You've completed several missions for one of our top handlers, codename: 'The Hand.' I've asked them to send you more optional tasks. They may be a bully, but you seem to enjoy the work. That's all hun. Get back to work."
